item.description:
This meeting is to set the agenda for autumn 2007 Valley911Truth actions and presentations. Can we get venues at Smith College or UMASS or other colleges to bring in speakers and programs for 9/11 truth? Also discussed will be having a music benefit in support of campaigns for Valley 9/11 Truth and Flyby News.

At Flyby News note these links:

CRITICAL BREAKING NEWS

Bush and 9/11 Investigative Reports,
looking into the unanswered questions.

BBC Reported World Trade Center Building
WTC-7 Collapsed 20 Minutes Before It Fell!

For a purposely produced film, see::
?9/11: Blueprint for Truth:
The Architecture of Destruction?

Valley 9/11 Truth will be presenting this
film 04 October 2007 in Northampton, MA
item.name: Organizational Meeting
